subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bears and tight end Desmond Clark agreed to a two-year contract extension through the 2010 season. He has averaged 13.2 yards a catch over the last two seasons, the most among N.F.L. tight ends.
snippet: The Chicago Bears and tight end Desmond Clark agreed to a two-year contract extension through the 2010 season. He has averaged 13.2 yards a catch over the last two seasons, the most among N.F.L. tight ends.
